sentences.sContent: You feel that rarely any more in the US.
sentences.sContent_eng: You feel that rarely any more in the US.
sentences.sCn: 而你在美国很少有这样的感觉。

sentences.sContent: Newspaper reports rarely get anyone's name  right.
sentences.sContent_eng: Newspaper reports rarely get anyone's name right.
sentences.sCn: 新闻报道很少把人的姓名搞对。

sentences.sContent: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.sContent_eng: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.sCn: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。
